NobleAI uses our innovative and unique Science-Based AI technology to transform current materials development strategies. We deliver actionable insights and reliable predictions to accelerate development and reduce costs of developing new chemicals, materials, and formulations.We see ourselves as a team of individuals striving to be excellent in everything we do. We value people who are thoughtful and respectful, while relentlessly focused on building and delivering products which help delight our customers and empower engineers and researchers to bring better products and services into the world faster.As a Lead Research Scientist, this role is responsible for carrying out research and developing mathematical algorithms which deliver value to our R&D customers.
